sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le président assistera à la réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The president will attend the meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En résumé, nous devons travailler dur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In short, we must work hard.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 最初，他不同意这个计划。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuìchū, tā bù tóngyì zhège jìhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Au début, il n'était pas d'accord avec ce plan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Initially, he didn't agree with this plan.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons empêcher les accidents de se produire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must prevent accidents from happening.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā fǒudìng le wǒ de tíyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a rejeté ma proposition.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He rejected my proposal.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ cāi wǒ mǎi le shénme?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Devine ce que j'ai acheté ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Guess what I bought?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les soldats défendent le pays.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The soldiers defend the country.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La police a encerclé le bâtiment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The police surrounded the building.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le médecin est en train de sauver le patient.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The doctor is rescuing the patient.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè bēijù gùshi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une histoire tragique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a tragic story.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle se sent très triste.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She feels very sad.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La voiture nécessite un entretien régulier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The car needs regular maintenance.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les ours polaires vivent dans l'Arctique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Polar bears live in the Arctic.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il se plaint toujours du temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He always complains about the weather.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 发现小偷后他立刻报警。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fāxiàn xiǎotōu hòu tā lìkè bàojǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a immédiatement appelé la police après avoir découvert le voleur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He immediately called the police after discovering the thief.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jìzhě cǎifǎng le nà wèi míngxīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le journaliste a interviewé cette star.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The reporter interviewed that star.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous nous comprenons mutuellement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We understand each other.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a un nez haut.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a high nose.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 食物和水是生存必需的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shíwù hé shuǐ shì shēngcún bìxū de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nourriture et l'eau sont essentielles à la survie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Food and water are essential for survival.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez venir en personne pour les formalités.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please come in person to handle this.
